name: Mario vs. Donkey Kong 2: March of the Minis
name_original: Mario vs. Donkey Kong 2: March of the Minis
description:
It's opening day of the new Super Mini Mario World theme park, and DK has kidnapped the guest of honor, Pauline. It's up to you and an army of freshly assembled Mini Mario toys to rescue her! Guide your Mini Marios through over 80 perilous stages while looking out for mini-minions.

This classic game is part of the Virtual Console service, which brings you great games created for consoles such as NES™, Super NES™ and Game Boy™ Advance. We hope you'll enjoy the new features (including off-TV play) that have been added to this title. See more Virtual Console games for Wii U.
